        run
      • run(code: var string; args: seq[string]; isFile: bool; doExecute: bool = true; withData = ""): Translation
        runBytecode
      • runBytecode(code: Translation; filename: string; args: seq[string])

The main VM module.

It initializes our main settings, orchestrates the different components of the VM and executes the given code via run.

Imports
